https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rhRmclxltjCKV0lKua8RrY5AT5V.jpg Bombay Summer explores the fleeting and delicate friendship between three young people in Mumbai, India. The film follows their journey of discovery, love and loss. Bombay Summer
